actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing continuation of a investigation by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

summary.text: Authorizes continuation of an investigation concerning improper conduct by House Members and employees by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct authorized during the 97th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing continuation of a investigation by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
